Enumeration Type Documentation

enum textImportanceLevel
 

Text importance levels determines the sort order.

Any change in order of these will affect the collision testing order.

Enumeration values:
LAND  Land.
BUILTUP_AREA  Built up area.
CITY_CENTRE  City centre.
BUILTUP_AREA_SQUARE  Builtup area, square symbol.
BUILTUP_AREA_SMALL  Builtup area, small symbol.
INDIVIDUALBUILDING  Individual building.
BUILDING  Building.
STREET_MAIN  Main class road.
STREET_FIRST  First class road.
STREET_SECOND  Second class road.
STREET_THIRD  Third class road.
PARK  Park.
ISLAND  Island.
WATER  Water.
WATER_LINE  Water.
STREET_FOURTH  Fourth class road.
FOREST  Forest.
PEDESTRIANAREA  Pedestrian area.
AIRCRAFTROAD  Aircraft road.
FERRY  Ferry.
OTHER  Other gfxFeatureTypes.

Definition at line 43 of file MapTextPlacement.h.

MapDrawingCommon::ObjectBoxes &  objectBBoxes,
ImageDraw *  image,
vector< GfxData * > &  gfxTextArray,
const DrawingProjection *  projection
) 
 

Ititializes the notices vector and sets the textattributes in the features of featureMap.

Parameters:
featureMap The GfxFeatureMap to set text for.
notices Set to contain the notices used to draw the text.
objectBBoxes Boundingboxes in mc2 coords of already added objects that must not be overlapped with text.
Returns:
true if textsetting succedded, false if not.
